exercise.searchForStudents: Search for students by login or name (comma separated)
exercise.searchForTeams: Search for teams by (short) name or for students by login/name (comma separated)
exercise.created: Created new Exercise with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the exercise {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exercise to confirm.

reset.question: Are you sure you want to reset the exercise {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!

import.markdownWarning: You can edit the problem statement after importing the exercise.
import.embeddedFilesWarning: All embedded files are available in the problem statement after the import.

importFromFile.notSupportedExerciseType: The exercise type {{ exerciseType }} is not supported for importing from file.

exercise.notStarted: You have not started this exercise yet.
exercise.exampleSolutionPublicationDateError: For graded exercises, Example Solution Publication Date must be after Release, Start and Due Date if set. Please check your selection again
exercise.exampleSolutionPublicationDateWarning: Example Solution Publication Date is before Due Date!
exercise.feedbackSuggestionsEnabledTooltip: If enabled, Athena will suggest feedback to tutors on some submissions.
exercise.usageCountHint: This number specifies how many times the score of this instruction may be included in the final score.
exercise.creditsHint: This number specifies the score for this instruction.
exercise.gradingScaleHint: The scale describes the performance level for the instruction. Some examples are: excellent, good, average, poor.
exercise.descriptionHint: The description of a particular performance level may include additional notes about when to apply this instruction.
exercise.feedbackHint: Feedback is an explanatory text for the students in order to better understand their performance level.
exercise.dragDropInstruction: Drag & Drop the assessment instruction to feedback element
exercise.title: Title
exercise.dueDateError: Due Date must be after Release Date and Start Date if present. Please check your selection again.
exercise.startDateError: Start Date must be after Release Date. Please check your selection again.
exercise.assessmentDueDateError: Assessment Due Date must be after Release, Start and Due Date. Please check your selection again.
exercise.noReleaseDateWarning: You have not defined a release date for this exercise, this means that it will be immediately published and made visible to the students. But they can only participate after the currently defined start date.
exercise.noReleaseAndStartDateWarning: You have not defined a release and start date for this exercise, this means that it will be immediately published and students can participate in the exercise.
exercise.pointsError: Must be a number between 1 and 9999.
exercise.bonusPointsError: Must be a number between 0 and 9999.
exercise.includedInOverallScoreCourseLabel: Include this exercise in the course score calculation
exercise.includedInOverallScoreExamLabel: Include this exercise in the exam score calculation
exercise.categoriesTooltip: You can define up to two categories per exercise (Enter category and press ENTER). You are free in defining them, though it might be best to use them consistently. They will be visible to students.
exercise.includedCompletelyTooltip: All points and bonus points earned in this exercise count towards your course/exam score!
exercise.includedAsBonusTooltip: All points earned in this exercise count towards your course/exam score as bonus points!
exercise.notIncludedTooltip: No points earned in this exercise count towards your course/exam score!
exercise.modeTooltip: The solving mode of an exercise determines whether students work alone or in teams. NOTE: This cannot be changed later on!

teamAssignmentConfig.teamSizeTooltip: Recommendation for tutors regarding the minimum and maximum number of students per team.

results.title: Export Results
results.withTestCasesTooltip: This will include additional information about passed and failed test cases for each result entry.
results.withTestCasesAndFeedbackTooltip: This will include information about test cases and a copy of the provided feedback for failed test cases.

exercise.personalRepositoryClone: Your personal repository has been set up. Click the Code button!
exercise.personalRepositoryOnline: Your personal repository has been set up. Click the button Open code editor!
exercise.resumeProgrammingExercise: The exercise has been resumed. You can now continue working on the exercise!
exercise.feedbackRequestSent: Your feedback request has been sent.
exercise.feedbackRequestAlreadySent: Your feedback request has already been sent.
exercise.notEnoughPoints: You have to submit your work at least once.
exercise.lockRepositoryWarning: Your repository will be locked. You can only continue working after you receive an answer.
exercise.feedbackRequestAfterDueDate: You cannot submit feedback requests after the due date.
exercise.feedbackRequestPendingChanges: You have pending changes. Please submit them first before requesting Feedback.
exercise.maxAthenaResultsReached: You have reached the maximum number of AI feedback requests.
exercise.athenaFeedbackSuccessful: AI feedback successfully generated. Click on the result to view details.
exercise.athenaFeedbackFailed: Something went wrong... AI feedback could not be generated at the moment
exercise.submissionAlreadyHasAthenaResult: This submission already has an existing AI result. Please submit again before requesting further feedback.
exercise.startError: Uh oh! Something went wrong... Please try again to start the exercise in a few minutes.
exercise.name: Name
exercise.showingOnlyInRange: Showing only results in range: {{ range }}
exercise.showingOfResults: Showing {{ filtered }} of {{ total }} ({{ percent }}%) scores
exercise.isFileUpload: This is a file upload exercise
exercise.lateSubmissionResultReceived: Artemis received an ungraded result for a late submission, please scroll down to see the score in the result history.
exercise.resultCreationUnsuccessful: The result could not be created

presentationScoreEnabled.title: Presentation
presentationScoreEnabled.description: If the presentation score is enabled, tutors can enter points for students on the "Participation" page of the exercise.

title.undefined: There has to be a title set!
title.pattern: The title must only consist of alphanumeric characters and '_', '-' or whitespaces!

channelName.empty: There has to be a channel name set!

shortName.undefined: There has to be a short name set!
shortName.pattern: The short name must begin with a letter and must not contain any special characters!
shortName.minlength: The short name must be at least 3 characters long!

packageName.undefined: There has to be a package name set!

pattern.JAVA: The package name must consist of one or more valid Java identifiers separated by '.', e.g. "net.java"!
pattern.KOTLIN: The package name must consist of one or more valid Kotlin identifiers separated by '.', e.g. "net.kotlin"!
pattern.SWIFT: The package name must consist of one or more valid Swift identifiers without any separator, e.g. "SwiftEx"!
pattern.JAVA_BLACKBOX: The package name must be a valid Java identifier. In addition, no dots are allowed in the package name of DejaGnu projects

points.undefined: There has to be a value for the points set!
points.customMin: The number of points must be at least 1!
points.customMax: The number of points may not exceed 9999!

bonusPoints.undefined: There has to be a value for the bonus points set!
bonusPoints.customMin: The number of bonus points must be at least 0!
bonusPoints.customMax: The number of bonus points may not exceed 9999!

minTeamSize.min: The minimal team size must not be less than 1 person.
minTeamSize.max: The minimal team size must not exceed 99 people.

maxTeamSize.min: The maximal team size must not be less than 1 person.
maxTeamSize.max: The maximal team size must not exceed 99 people.

maxPenalty.pattern: The maximum penalty must be between 0 and 100 percent!

warning.warning: Warning: These changes could cause problems
warning.problems: To avoid inconsistencies between existing feedback and future feedback that is associated to affected grading instruction, the exercise has to be re-evaluated. This includes the recalculation of the results.
warning.confirmText: Do you want to save these changes or change them?
warning.deleteFeedback: Additionally delete all corresponding feedback that is associated with the deleted Grading Instruction.
warning.information: If you do not want to trigger a re-evaluation, we can not guarantee the consistency of feedback associated to this grading instruction.
